name: The Legend of the Angry Chicken
name_original: The Legend of the Angry Chicken
description:
Where did the other Kukos come from? 

You'll gonna find it in this game!

This game IS not A JOKE based on the events of another game.

How to play:

Move: WASD | ARROWS | Controller Left Stick

Jump: SPACE | K | X | A Button

Talk: L | C | B Button

Attack: J | Z | X Button

Inventory: N | Start
